reg_info.act_under: Funeral Directors and Establishments Act   Loi sur les directeurs de services funéraires et les établissements funéraires

content.content: 1. The Board of Funeral Services shall be composed of, (a) eight funeral directors appointed under paragraph 1 of subsection 4 (1) of the Act; and (b) five persons appointed under paragraph 2 of subsection 4 (1) of the Act. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 467, s. 1; O. Reg. 583/92, s. 1; O. Reg. 229/97, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The Board of Funeral Services shall be composed of,

(a) eight funeral directors appointed under paragraph 1 of subsection 4 (1) of the Act; and

(b) five persons appointed under paragraph 2 of subsection 4 (1) of the Act. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 467, s. 1; O. Reg. 583/92, s. 1; O. Reg. 229/97, s. 1.
